title: If You Were Mine
description: Having Ryan Sterling for a best friend just worked... until he fell in love and married someone else. I shouldn't want him, but we can't help who we fall in love with, right?What if what we wanted was considered taboo? What if who we fell in love with ruined lives whilst creating new ones? Do we cross that line by giving into temptation or do we sit by the sidelines to spare everyone involved?I never meant to do anything, but one thing changed everything.
author: K.S. Marshall
